tuning_runs.notes: FAILED: Score +0.0038 but time +27.2 min (85.6 vs 58.4 baseline). Massively over budget.

conclusion: FAILED - Larger pool (15 vs 10) improved score slightly (+0.0038) but increased runtime by 46% (+27.2 min). The marginal accuracy gain does not justify the massive time penalty. Baseline pool_size=10 is already optimal for the time budget.
key_finding: Each additional candidate in the pool adds NM polish time. The baseline pool_size=10 is already at the optimal accuracy/time tradeoff.
